item.title: âœ¨ 1.6.0 Release
item.description: Release notes # Add the PackageDir context variable to reference the package’s directory, same as the Cache and Root context variables. Cache and Root variables are deprecated. Extend the format of the flag definition. Now it is possible to add bool type flags: [name] \t [shorthand] \t [description] \t [type] \t [default]. Currently, two types are supported: string and bool. both type and default value are optional, by default, the type is “string”, and the default value is the empty string.
